availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William H. Johnson (Boyd County, KY, farmer)

body.p: Boyd County, Kentucky, farmer. Maryland native. Married to Miranda Johnson. Father of Thomas Johnson, John Johnson, William Johnson, Mary Johnson, and Betty M. Johnson. Farmer in Boyd County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boyd County, Catlettsburg, p. 804.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Georgia, Putnam County, Rockville, p. 39A.
